ABOUT FUN 2 DIVE MANATEE TOURS
Since 1995, Fun 2 Dive Manatee Tours has been creating unforgettable, up-close-and-personal manatee encounters in beautiful Crystal River, Florida. Our daily Classic, Semi-Private and Private tours to swim with manatees provide the experience of a lifetime annually for tens of thousands of visitors from all corners of the world.
Our manatee swim tours are all-inclusive, meaning that all the necessary snorkeling gear, including the wetsuit, mask and snorkel are furnished at no additional charge. There are no additional fees or upcharges for parking, gear, fuel, etc.
Each of our manatee swim tour groups has an in-water guide and photographer who will be with you from your arrival to your departure. Your professional in water guide takes photographs throughout your manatee tour, generally ending up with 50-100 images from each trip. Once you return from your manatee experience, your photos are available for viewing and for purchase if desired.
At Fun 2 Dive Manatee Tours, we are big into sustainable ecotourism. We believe in responsible tourism that respects the ecosystem and avoids putting undue stress on the manatees and their habitat while still delivering an exciting and educational experience that you remember for a lifetime. Keeping our tour groups small enables us to do our part in minimizing the impact of visitors to the manatee refuge, at the same time providing you with a comfortable and relaxing experience with room to stretch out and enjoy your time on the water.
Fun 2 Dive is fully permitted by the United States Fish and Wildlife Service which allows us bring our guests into the National Wildlife Refuge waters for the purpose of swimming with the manatees.
Reserve your seats on the boat today to experience one of our unique tours and swim in the wild with these lovable and incredible creatures!
Most Popular!
Classic Manatee Swim
From
$
70.95
Our classic manatee tour is an adventure that you and your family are sure to remember forever. Conducted daily, this approximately three-hour swim with manatees tour packs a whole lot of adventure, education, and excitement!
Learn More
Users
Maximum of 12 People
Tag
Private Tour $700
You have questions; we have answers!
Chevron down
What is the best time of day to swim with the manatees?
Like most wildlife tours, getting out early is generally the best option, and swimming with the manatees is no exception. We always recommend our early morning tour for those who would like to get out early and beat the crowds.
Chevron down
Do I have to know how to swim?
Yes, we are swimming with the manatees. Actually, floating with them more than swimming. The wetsuits that you wear provide buoyancy, and we also provide foam swim noodles to those who wish to have additional floatation. We do require that participants are comfortable in the water.
Chevron down
Why should I book with Fun 2 Dive?
We are the #1 rated manatee tour company in Crystal River.
We have been conducting tours in Crystal River since 1995.
Read More…
What are you waiting for?
Swim with the manatees today!
Book Now!
